original_title: La Roque d'Anthéron - Les pianos de la nuit: Zoltán Kocsis
overview: "Les Pianos De La Nuit" is a collection of piano recitals performed live in the heart of Provence during the International Piano Festival of La Roque D'Antheron in July and August 2002. Conceived specifically for DVD release, these virtuoso performances by contemporary artists can claim authoritative status as classic 21st-century archival footage.  Tracklisting:  BARTOK Bela :  - Piano sonata Sz.80 BB.88  BEETHOVEN Ludwig van :  - Piano sonata no°27 op.90  LISZT Franz :  - Les jeux d'eau à  la Villa d'Este, for piano in F-sharp major S.163/4  - Danse macabre (Saint-Saëns), for piano S.555  - Hungarian rhapsody no°5, for orchestra in E minor S.359/5 "Héroïde-élégiaque"  SCHUBERT Franz :  - Piano sonata in E minor D.566
title: La Roque d'Anthéron - The Pianos of the Night: Zoltán Kocsis
